com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.control

Class MockTagsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.control.MockTagsController

  • public final class MockTagsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class providing static methods for managing life cycle of mock Tags. The current implementations can:
    • create
    • delete
    • describe
    mock Tags.
